StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechTree_Name
StringTable.String: Base Tech Tree

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechTree_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The base tech tree.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechTree_Dec
StringTable.String: The base tech tree.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Colonization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of colony modules and basic colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: For generations mankind has dreamed of setting foot on other worlds. That dream is now a reality. Feet are being set on other worlds. We're setting lots of things on other worlds actually.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoIndustrializationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Industrialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoIndustrializationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoIndustrializationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Everything is harder on the surface of an alien world, every machine we own having to be adjusted for the differences in gravity or atmosphere, all our old constants and empirical shortcuts having to be thrown out and re-written.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Manufacturing Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: There's no sense stopping at "basic competence" when it comes to making things in alien environments. We should probably learn from the many mistakes we're still making, for example.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Research Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves research capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our rapidly expanding frontiers have made available thousands and thousands of new things to look at under a microscope. Expanding our research capabilities will allow our scientists to keep up.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of building manufacturing and research centers.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Having found out what works and doesn't work on alien planets, we've been able to standardize and modularize our building construction practices a bit, which should reduce building costs across our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAdvancedConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Construction

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAdvancedConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAdvancedConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in material sciences has given us the tools to build bigger and bolder, to finally catch up with some of the wilder imaginings our architects have come up with.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Optimized Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Every time we ramp up the scale of our manufacturing, we also ramp up the scale of our mistakes. It takes time and effort to weed those out, but it needs to be done if we want to reach our true manufacturing potential.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We resisted letting the accountants into the manufacturing centers for a long time, because the work is dangerous and also because no-one likes them. But once they found a way to sneak in, they did admittedly find several ways to cut manufacturing costs.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of manufacturing plants.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Factories and manufacturing plants generate a lot of toxic byproducts which are expensive to dispose of. By making our manufacturing processes even a bit less wasteful, we expect to see broad cost savings over the life of a plant.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoManufacturingMethods_Name
StringTable.String: Precision Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoManufacturingMethods_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoManufacturingMethods_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our more precise manufacturing processes have resisted the move off-world, adapting them to a broad range of planetary and micro-gravitational environments proving to be a surprisingly challenging endeavor. We think we've got it now, but nevertheless still recommend you invest in extended warranties.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Military Industry

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves military manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Tooling our manufacturing centers to specialize in military production sends a pretty unfriendly message to anyone paying close attention to us. But it should make everyone in adaptive camo fatigues happy.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Social Industry

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves civilian manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the unforeseen side-effects of managing a civilization on this scale is finding things to do with all these people. Keeping them happy is as important as keeping them safe, and they can sometimes be pretty difficult about it.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Competitive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces manufacturing costs.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We thought we cleared them out after the last time, but some more accountants managed to slip into our manufacturing centers. Or they're living in the walls now. Regardless, they've found some more ways for us to reduce our manufacturing overhead.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialExpertise_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Expertise

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialExpertise_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialExpertise_Dec
StringTable.String: By manipulating materials at the level of individual atoms, we can now construct things of unparalleled precision and complexity. Which has massively expanded our industrial capacity, along with creating an entirely new class of pretty terrifying workplace safety issues.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Military Assembly

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves military manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: We're slowly eking out the last possible efficiencies of our military manufacturing processes. Our civilization is now essentially a war machine itself.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Social Construction Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves social manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Few of our civilians seem to realize the challenge of constructing the farms, hospitals, and entertainment complexes that they rely on to survive. And yet every time we try to tell them they just yawn and walk away.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPracticalFusion_Name
StringTable.String: Practical Fusion

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPracticalFusion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved powerplants.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPracticalFusion_Dec
StringTable.String: Cascading fusion reactors will allow our manufacturing plants to be more effective. Although these represent an enormous security risk, even the most vicious heretics wouldn't be foolish enough to tamper with them.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericQuantumPower_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Power

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericQuantumPower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic powerplants.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericQuantumPower_Dec
StringTable.String: By tapping into the quantum zero point energy of a vacuum, our physicists claim that we now have access to a massive source of power. It's not infinite, but boy is there ever a lot of it.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInstitutionalResearch_Name
StringTable.String: Institutional Research

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInstitutionalResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInstitutionalResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: We're at our best when we're not just living in this universe, but observing it. Figuring it out. Sometimes dismantling small parts of it. By setting up special places for that to happen, we expect research breakthroughs to occur much more frequently.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Optimized Research

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases research capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We've improved and made more efficient many of our research practices, which should lead to faster research, or at the very least, less researchers complaining about red tape.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Research Cost Reduction

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the manufacturing cost of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: In the rush to begin processing and analyzing all the new data our rapid expansion has provided, managerial oversight has slackened, and a number of horribly wasteful research practices became commonplace. By eliminating those we should be able to make our research quite a bit cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Research

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Research labs are full of expensive toys which are in a near constant state of breaking down. By considering even a bit how to do some of this more sustainably, we expect to see broad cost savings over the life of a lab.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchCenters_Name
StringTable.String: Research Centers

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchCenters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchCenters_Dec
StringTable.String: By putting all of our smartest people and their favorite toys into the same building, we expect to see significant improvements in our ability to research new fields. Also, we'll give them food so they have no reason to leave.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Focused Research

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Research capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on pure research we have been able to get a significant improvement on the rate of new discoveries.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Research Production Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of Research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on our research infrastructure we have been able to cut down the cost of building new facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Research Economics

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces Maintenance of Research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing how our researchers work and eliminating some of the more wasteful experiments, we have been able to significantly reduce the maintenance of our research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIntegratedResearch_Name
StringTable.String: Integrated Research

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIntegratedResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIntegratedResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: In the last few years we've made great strides in our understanding of the universe, and now require larger academies to facilitate the multi-disciplinary studies needed to push back the veil further. The researchers are also demanding something called a "faculty bar."

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchMatrixTech_Name
StringTable.String: Research Matrix

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchMatrixTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Imagine the benefit of millions of scientists, working away in a city-sized research facility, with none of the distractions of the outside world like weather or family or basic social contact. Yes, a few of them will probably turn into psychopaths, but we were planning to keep an eye on them anyways.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDeeperKnowledge_Name
StringTable.String: Deeper Knowledge

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDeeperKnowledge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDeeperKnowledge_Dec
StringTable.String: In the past years our understanding of the universe has grown by leaps and bounds. Teams who have made an effort to slow down and consider some of the implications of these discoveries are now revealing deeper patterns in the fabric of reality.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericQuantumUnderstanding_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Understanding

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericQuantumUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericQuantumUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: We're no longer groping blindly at the edge of the sub-atomic world. For one thing, our researchers are pretty sure there are actually twenty eight edges to the sub-atomic world, that they're less edges than toroid's, and that there are actually now zero of them. It turns out that reality is super complicated.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBeyondMortality_Name
StringTable.String: Beyond Mortality

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBeyondMortality_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced deep research facilities. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBeyondMortality_Dec
StringTable.String: Ascension will make us immortal, and usher us into a reality that is beyond this one. What lies there remains a mystery, but we've never backed away from those before.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchCoordination_Name
StringTable.String: Research Coordination

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchCoordination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of research support facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchCoordination_Dec
StringTable.String: Coordinating research teams scattered across multiple worlds has only gotten more challenging as our civilization has grown. Research Coordination Centers should help ease that challenge, and minimize any duplication of effort.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericNeroLinking_Name
StringTable.String: Neuro Linking

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericNeroLinking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved research support facilities.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericNeroLinking_Dec
StringTable.String: The benefits of direct brain-to-brain communication will be felt in a wide variety of fields, but considering how socially awkward many of our researchers are, we suspect they'll profit the most from living in a world without small talk.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetaryImprovement_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Improvement

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetaryImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of civilian buildings. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetaryImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: Half the fun of moving to a new place is fixing it up to suit your needs. That's harder when the new place is an entire alien planet, but we're finally developing the tools and techniques to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Soil Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farming technology has improved dramatically, and we're beginning to see enhanced crop yields as a result.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Accelerated Growth

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we're able to modulate the effects an alien world has on fertility, our population growth rates are beginning to trend upwards. More babies for now, but more workers soon enough.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Enhanced Production

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We're no longer just surviving on new worlds, but thriving there. Thanks to improved nutrient yields and preservation techniques, our workers can work longer and harder, improving the production capacity of our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Adaptation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved farms. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting our agricultural expertise to fit a variety of alien environments has proven very difficult, and taken many simultaneous advances in our understanding of soil, atmospheric science, and shovels. That's right. On some planets, we need special shovels.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Accelerated Agriculture

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting our planting, feeding, and harvesting regimens to account for differences in the seasons of alien worlds takes a lot of effort and has to be fine tuned on every planet. But now that we're able to do it, we expect to see greater food yields.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Agriculture

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of farms.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have more experience growing food on alien worlds, our agricultural engineers are able to predict in advance what farming equipment a colony will need before its formed, leading to lower startup costs.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Agriculture

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance cost of farms.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By taking a step back from the cutting edge of agriculture science, and using older, more reliable equipment, we can reduce the costs of running most of our farms.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIntensiveFarming_Name
StringTable.String: Intensive Farming

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIntensiveFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced farms.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIntensiveFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: Maximizing the food production of a given plot of soil is an expensive but very necessary step for those worlds where arable land comes at a premium.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Nutritional Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The microbes present in alien soil react differently to nutrients than we're used to, and it's taken awhile to fine tune our fertilization techniques to keep our own plants fed. But now that we have, we expect to see even greater food production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Farm Adaptability Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of farms.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We've finally homed in on the species and strains of plants which adapt to the widest range of environments. By focusing our production efforts on these crops, the startup costs for any farm should now be much more manageable.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Farm Management Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of farms.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Farmers throughout our civilization are tackling unique agricultural challenges every day. By implementing civilization-wide information sharing systems, we can spread our best practices further, reducing farming operational costs everywhere.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLosslessFarming_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Farming

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLosslessFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic farms.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLosslessFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: Improvements in our recycling and nutrient delivery systems have led to almost perfectly efficient farms. Our farmers don't even need to get their hands dirty now, and are actually getting a bit precious about it.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Farmers

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our food production capacity has taken another step forward. Also, we've finally gotten that weird taste out of micro-gravity raised carrots.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Abundance

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Farms increase population growth.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have such an excess quantity of food now that many of our people have taken it almost as a challenge to create families capable of consuming it all.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFoodDistributionTech_Name
StringTable.String: Food Distribution

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFoodDistributionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFoodDistributionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: It sounds boring, and it is also actually boring, but thanks to advances in Xeno-accounting and the resulting improvement in the logistics of our food distribution system, we're now saving a lot of food which had previously gone to waste.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoIrrigation_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Irrigation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoIrrigation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoIrrigation_Dec
StringTable.String: There are a number of surprising challenges when irrigating an alien planet, related to the unique gravity, soil, and atmosphere we might find there. Also, the water is often hiding.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiomassResequencing_Name
StringTable.String: Biomass Resequencing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiomassResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiomassResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: Fundamentally, food is little more than long chains of carbon arranged into molecules that we find digestible and tasty. Plants and animals have done a fine job of sequencing these chains to date, but isn't it time we maybe let a robot take a crack at it?

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoBiology_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Biology

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoBiology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoBiology_Dec
StringTable.String: Understanding how our old familiar plants grow on alien worlds will be critical to our chances of survival when colonizing the stars. And if we want to avoid destroying the biosphere of our new homes, we'd better have a handle on what our germs are about to do to them too.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPopulationEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Population Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPopulationEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPopulationEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: It takes a lot of the romance out of it, but for our colonies to succeed, they need babies, and they need them quickly. This research into fertility enhancement and mood music should help.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBioReplication_Name
StringTable.String: Bio Replication

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBioReplication_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBioReplication_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that once we took all of the fun parts out of reproduction, we could dramatically increase our growth rates. Sure bio-replication might be ushering us into a nightmarish world of conformism and fewer available parking spaces, but we're sure we'll manage somehow.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentalEngineering_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Engineering

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentalEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows soil enhancement and improves adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentalEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to improve and enhance the environment we work in will provide benefits to almost every aspect of colonization, and make walks in the outdoors a little less deadly.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases manufacturing adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By tweaking our environmental modifications to accommodate the high-energy and resource demands of the manufacturing sector, we expect to see improved production. And less environment.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Research

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases research adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have a variety of environmental needs, from a supply of extremely clean air and water, to high quality land for research farms. By accommodating them, we can expect to see faster and more efficient research.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Economics

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases economic adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Representatives of private business continually ask us for clear, flat land, rid of all those awful alien plants and rocks. If we give it to them, we'll both get them off our backs, and boost the local economy.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericExtremeWorldColonization_Name
StringTable.String: Extreme Colonization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericExtremeWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on extreme worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericExtremeWorldColonization_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer are we limited to the low-hanging fruit of the galaxy's stock of planets. It won't be an easy life for anyone living on these new worlds, but it will be a life.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Aquatic World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Aquatic Worlds, and boost their wealth and Tourism.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience dealing with the challenges of life on aquatic worlds has allowed us to make living there almost as comfortable as anywhere else in our civilization. Bathing caps are no longer mandatory.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Frozen World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Frozen Worlds, and boost their Research and Influence.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now so good at living on snowball worlds, that many colonists go days at a time without using mittens, something which would have been considered wildly reckless even a few years ago.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Barren World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Barren Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing and Military.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: It took some expensive, massively invasive water recycling technology to do it, but life on barren worlds is now more or less as productive as anywhere else. The catheters are now much more comfortable too.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAtmosphericCleansing_Name
StringTable.String: Atmospheric Cleansing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAtmosphericCleansing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on radioactive and toxic worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAtmosphericCleansing_Dec
StringTable.String: Even the foulest and most toxic planetary environments can now be colonized by us. Good luck to the poor bastards who go for it, but at least they'll now have a fighting chance.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiospherePerfection1_Name
StringTable.String: Radioactive World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiospherePerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Radioactive Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing output.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiospherePerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: The mutations and genetic defects which were a fact of life for the early colonists of radioactive worlds are now a thing of the past. Any further mutations are now for cosmetic purposes only.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiospherePerfection2_Name
StringTable.String: Toxic World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiospherePerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Toxic Worlds, and boost their Research output.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiospherePerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered the challenges of living on even the most poisonous of planets. You still won't want to go outside without your helmet, but we've moved most of the places worth going to inside anyways.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTerraformingTech_Name
StringTable.String: Terraforming

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTerraformingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTerraformingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Terraforming is a tricky business, delicately poised between making the world more habitable for us, without destroying an entire biosphere to do so. And there aren't any do-overs.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHabitatImprovement_Name
StringTable.String: Habitat Improvement

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHabitatImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHabitatImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate the biosphere has improved to the point that we can treat entire continents as a canvas. Will we paint a portrait of a thriving and prosperous civilization? Or the equivalent of writing our names in the snow in urine?

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSoilReclamation_Name
StringTable.String: Soil Reclamation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSoilReclamation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the use of almost useless terrain.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSoilReclamation_Dec
StringTable.String: Many planets do a very poor job of making terrain usable for colonial purposes. Where nature has dropped the ball, we've stepped in, and are now capable of developing what were once very marginal locations.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentalResequencing_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Resequencing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentalResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the amount of usable land on all colonized planets.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentalResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: We're playing with powerful forces now, capable of manipulating planetary terrain on a scale never before seen in history. We must use this power wisely, or at least not actively for evil.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEngineeringTech_Name
StringTable.String: Engineering

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Hyperdrives and tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEngineeringTech_Dec
StringTable.String: For generations, we've looked up at the stars and wondered, "what if?" Well buckle up, because "if" has happened. By bending space around our ships, they're able to use conventional propulsion within a pocket of normal space, while accelerating at vastly greater speeds in reality. The stars have gotten closer.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarTravel_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Travel

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensor, life support, and speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarTravel_Dec
StringTable.String: Even at the incredible speeds we can travel at now, if we want to journey anywhere beyond the closest stars, we'll need to make significant improvements to our navigational and life support systems. More refined Hyperdrives wouldn't hurt either.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperdrive Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: After analyzing how our first generation of Hyperdrives have (and haven't) worked, we've come up with a number of ways to improve our ship's speeds.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Transportation Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of Colony & Constructor modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pushing large Support Modules through space is inherently wasteful, by miniaturizing and optimizing the larger components, we can fit more on a ship, allowing them to go farther and faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Recirculation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: After listening to the complaints and coughs of our returning crews, we've improved the life support recirculation systems of our ships, which should marginally increase their effective range.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonDriveTech_Name
StringTable.String: Ion Drive

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonDriveTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By using magnetic fields to capture ions from the interstellar medium during Hyperdrive flight, we can funnel this additional mass into the exhaust of our conventional fusion engines, increasing the overall speed and efficiency of the propulsion system. We call these Ion Drives, and they make us go faster, basically.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Drives

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The ion capture technology of our Ion Drives requires a fiendish amount of tuning which our ship's engineers are only just learning to automate. Once this work is done, we should see slightly higher speeds across our fleet.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Hyperfield generators are no longer the rare pieces of equipment they once were, and we're beginning to see efficiencies of scale in the manufacture of them.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Every year our Hyperdrives get more efficient and smaller. Less room for the engines means more room for everything else, benefiting every type of ship we could conceive of.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Theory

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers are now able to "stack" up the space-bending fields of our Hyperdrives, magnifying the acceleration effect. They call these stacked fields "Warp Fields" and are able to use them to create vastly more powerful engines.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By tuning the arrangement of stacked hyperfields in a variety of dimensions, we've found some surprisingly cheap ways to improve the speed of our Warp Drives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Field Generator Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we're using stacked fields and multi-field generators, even the most miniscule improvement in efficiency we find leads to significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Field Generator Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of experience working with the effects of stacked hyperfields, we've determined that we were stacking them inefficiently. Smaller field generators can achieve the same effects as their fatter predecessors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpWaves_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp Waves

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpWaves_Dec
StringTable.String: A Hyperwarp Wave creates a cascading series of warp fields at a distance in front of the vessel, allowing the warp drive to effectively compress already compressed space. That glosses over a number of complicated mathematical issues which had to be sorted out to make it work, but our researchers now believe we can begin developing even faster drives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Drive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of drives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: No other civilization in the galaxy can match ours for the efficiency and ease with which we build our drives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the mass of drives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have all but mastered hyperfield technology, and are capable of wringing the most possible speed from even the smallest engines.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericStellarFoldingTech_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Folding

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate Hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericStellarFoldingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Stellar folding is the ultimate extension of hyperfield technology, bending space on a scale never seen before, with hyperfields approaching the diameter of a star. Our ships are now the fastest in the galaxy, and perhaps the fastest the galaxy has ever seen.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperfieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperfield Projection

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperfieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Careful analysis of the way hyperfield waves interact when ships are travelling in formation has revealed the possibility of building larger field generators capable of increasing the drive efficiency of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGravityFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Gravity Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGravityFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: It took many decades of effort before our physicists were finally able to find the graviton. It turned out to be inside us the whole time. Inside of everything the whole time, to be technical. Anyways, having harnessed its power, we can now generate large artificial gravity fields, which should greatly increase the maneuverability and tactical options of our ships in combat.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperfieldDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperfield Disruption

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of enemy speed reduction modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperfieldDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: By analyzing the interference effects of multiple hyperwave fields from different ships travelling in close proximity, and combining that with our ability to generate hyperfield effects at ever increasing ranges, we can now limit the speed of enemy ships within the range of a properly equipped starbase.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericStellarFieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Field Projection

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericStellarFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: The Stellar Field Projector allows properly equipped ships to effectively "tow" ships with less capable drives. The same technology will help us improve the hyperfield enhancing capabilities of our Starbases.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSurvey_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Survey

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved sensors and survey modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: "Look before you leap," is excellent advice in all sorts of aspects of life and galactic civilization building. Now we finally have the tools to do just that.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Amplification

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases sensor range.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of nano-processors allow us to more rapidly process the massive volumes of information our sensors return, improving the overall effectiveness of our sensor systems.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensors Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The hyperfield detectors which our sensors use were originally cobbled together from left over drives. Now that we have dedicated sensor manufacturing equipment, we can expect to see some significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our earliest sensors were crude, jury-rigged things, and if we begin swapping out their parts for dedicated sensor-specific equipment, we should see significant weight savings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldSensors_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Sensors

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced sensors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: We've long been able to detect the fields which all ships emit to control their Hyperdrives. But improvements in our understanding of the effects of space folding have revealed that those fields are detectable at much greater distances than previously believed.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Field Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases sensor range.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our technicians have found that by turning one of the knobs up, our sensor systems can see a bit further. We feel kind of dumb for not realizing this before.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Efficacy Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Further refinements to our sensor manufacturing process has led to the production of cheaper, more efficient sensors. The accountants are all very excited.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Sensors

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The creation of high-density field detection components should lead to more compact sensors, leaving our ship designers more room to install guns. Everyone wins. Except the people the guns are pointed at.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSubspaceSensors_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Sensors

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSubspaceSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic sensors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSubspaceSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Subspace is the 12-dimension space that lies at right angles to and a little bit behind our universe, and it took us a very long time to figure out how to look at it. The upshot is that we can now build a new generation of very powerful sensors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Simplification

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: When a ragtag group of science-accountants teamed up with the goal of identifying cost savings in our most advanced sensor systems, few believed they had a chance. Many openly mocked them. Some people spit on them. But somehow they managed it.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of sensors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of the latest generation of sensor systems has revealed that several of their components don't technically have to exist in this universe. By shifting their workload into another plane, we can reduce the amount of mass we have to lug around in ours.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTargetingAssistTech_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Assist

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTargetingAssistTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and stealth modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTargetingAssistTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Study of how our ships have performed (and occasionally underperformed) in combat have led to a number of improvements in our tactical targeting systems. At the same time, we've devised a system which should confuse enemy sensors, for even greater tactical benefit.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTargetingSupport_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Support

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTargetingSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and jamming modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTargetingSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: We've adapted our tactical sensor improvements into support modules, capable of allowing a single ship to provide the same sensor accuracy and jamming benefits to an entire fleet of vessels.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoArcheology_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Archeology

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research, and begins the path towards Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoArcheology_Dec
StringTable.String: For some time now we've known of a race, or races, of long dead aliens who we've been calling Precursors. They were obviously massively beyond us in their technological capacity, and it's taken some doing to adapt our survey systems and techniques to even identify their relics as such. But now that we have, we hope to learn a few of their secrets.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorStudies_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Studies

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've had an opportunity to study a few precursor relics, we've been able to detect patterns in them which have allowed us to build a framework which should greatly aid future Precursor research efforts.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Technologist

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic research benefits.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Understanding Precursor artifacts involves throwing out many of our pre-conceived notions about technology. Their interfaces don't just assume we have different anatomy; they assume we have different ways of thinking entirely.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Cultural Studies

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic cultural benefits.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The public seems fascinated by the very idea of the Precursors, and the few relics that we've found have had a surprising range of effects on our society. If we desire, we can begin trying to capitalize on these cultural benefits. Precursor souvenirs. Wacky Precursor catchphrases. Things like that.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Capitalization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor relic economic benefits.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We're only just scratching the surface of most of the Precursor relics we can get our hands on, most of which only seem able to generate patterns of pretty lights. Though it turns out there is a massive consumer market for that, so...

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorExploitation_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Exploitation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorExploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The study of Precursor relics requires very specialized equipment. The construction of dedicated facilities staffed with Precursor specialists will allow us to make the most of these incredible artifacts.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorEngineering_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Engineering

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: We've advanced to the stage that we can begin trying to recreate some of the Precursor's technology. Some extremely advanced fabrication equipment will be needed to even attempt this, but the benefits to our other research programs could be immeasurable.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorUnderstanding_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Understanding

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: New Precursor relics are almost immediately incorporated into our understanding of the physical universe, and we're now close to building our own relics ourselves. We have almost as full an understanding of Precursor technology as the Precursors did themselves. We wonder if they'd be our friends?

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupport_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems surprising that the factor limiting the travel range for most ships is its life support system, but there you have it. For anything less than a colony ship, keeping the occupants alive is now a bigger challenge than keeping the engines fueled.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Life Support

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases ship range.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience with the rigors of space travel, and the shrieked radio transmissions of the few who fell to the rigors of space travel, have revealed a number of small improvements we might be able to make to our existing life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Reducing the cost of building life support systems is one of those necessary things we have to do that we don't want to advertise too much. It's hard enough finding naval recruits as it is.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By minimizing the amount of weight and space our life support systems take up, we leave more room for our life reduction systems, which is what we're now calling guns.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Generation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: Our growing familiarity with force fields has enabled us to replace our mechanical life support systems with more elegant field based processors. Food is now stored in a single block of nutrient-rich sludge, piped directly into the user's mouth.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Support Range Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases ship range.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that by aerating the nutrient sludge we provide our crews it takes up significantly more volume in their stomachs, making them feel full with less food. There are some associated problems with, uh, gas, but we're coming up with special filters to address that.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Support Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our life support systems are now really, really cheap. Still effective though, let's not forget that. Maybe let's not even call them cheap. "Economical," or "Value," maybe.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the latest generation of efficient field generators, and putting our crews on a diet, we've been able to reduce the mass of our life support systems even more.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPromethionSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Promethion Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPromethionSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The Promethion Support System is the logical extension of our support field technologies, with all the requirements for a living organism - oxygen, water, and food - now piped directly into that organism rather than left to float around and get on the equipment.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Support System Assembly

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support cost.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the crews are finding out how little we're spending on their life support systems. "Do you think we're worthless?" they shout. And we don't, we really don't. They're not worthless at all! Worth less, yes. But that's different.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Support Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces life support mass.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We've figured out how to coax nutrient sludge to deliver itself to the crew using embedded Promethion field effectors, saving us the weight of carrying around heavy fixed effectors. And the embedded effectors come right out in the waste stream, ready for reuse!

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLosslessSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLosslessSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Our life support systems are now close to perfect, wasting no resources whatsoever, and recycling essentially all generated waste products. As an added bonus, the experience of being surrounded and penetrated by deeply personal fields is now much less humiliating for the crew.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our switch to field based life support systems has revealed the possibility of offloading partial life support requirements to other vessels. Additionally, the minimization of food requirements makes it now possible to supplement fleet range via unmanned supply probes launched from an appropriately equipped facility.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericExplorationExtention_Name
StringTable.String: Exploration Extension

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericExplorationExtention_Dec
StringTable.String: We've adapted the latest in Promethion support field technology to be used by our fleet-support vessels, increasing a fleet's total potential travel range. Additionally, we've made significant improvements to our starbase life support extension modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalManufacturing_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved manufacturing buildings, and small hulls.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our ship construction operations to micro-gravity environments will eventually allow for the construction of massive structures. We're not quite there yet, but this, the first step out of the well, was always going to be the biggest.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Skilled Starship Construction

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Shipyard manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that you can't just put anyone in a space suit and get them to build things in orbit, because a huge majority of people don't understand what an orbit is. Some improved training programs should dramatically improve our orbital manufacturing capability.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Logistics

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Orbital plane change maneuvers are expensive, and something we want to avoid if we can. Getting material to the right orbit when it needs to be there is a huge challenge which we're only just coming to grips with.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Storage Maximization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Ironically enough, space is at a premium in space, inside of our hulls at least. Even small improvements in packing efficiencies are worth the effort of hunting them down.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Gravity Construction

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of medium hulls.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Most of our initial attempts at building structures in micro-gravity environments were clumsy variations of ground-based techniques, not far removed from banging rocks together. Now we have the expertise to design and implement true zero-gravity construction practices, opening the door to a whole new scale of vessels.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Reinforcement

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull hit points.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: After donating a few hulls for weapons practice, we were able to see the structural damage inflicted on them, we identify structural reinforcements that should toughen each ship substantially.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shipyard Efficiency

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Worksite planning in an orbital environment is a seriously complicated business, but now that we've got the hang of it, we should see significant cost savings for every hull we construct.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: High Capacity Hulls

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our new zero gravity construction program has enabled us to build hollow structural elements which are still able to handle very high compression loads. By maximizing the use of these, and routing various ancillary ship systems through the cavities, we can save space for mission critical equipment.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLargeScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Large Scale Construction

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLargeScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of large hulls.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLargeScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Building larger space ship hulls requires a lot more than just adding more stuff to them. Just ensuring that they won't collapse on themselves under acceleration is a serious challenge. Seating arrangements are another key factor, so that the crew doesn't collapse in on themselves under acceleration.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Hardened Hulls

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull hit points.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems counter-intuitive, but by introducing very small weaknesses in the molecular structure of our hulls, we can make them deformable in very controllable ways, which makes them quite a bit more resilient.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Starship Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of self-propelled manufacturing equipment allows our worker to maneuver inside of hulls with more ease than ever before, reducing the challenge and expense of construction.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Capacity Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: As our hulls grew ever larger, we began to lose some of the art of packing that our predecessors had. But now thanks to the scale of our ships, even very small improvements in packing can lead to much more room for everything else.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericMassiveScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Massive Scale Construction

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericMassiveScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of huge hulls.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericMassiveScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: We're building some of the largest ships this galaxy has ever seen, capable of blotting out the stars. Obviously any ship can blot out the stars if you get close enough to it. You just don't have to get very close to these ones for that to be the case. Nor would you want to.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Master shipwrights

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of hulls.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: That we build the best ships in the galaxy is undeniable, but that we do it so economically is what's really impressive. Our enemies have never been menaced so thriftily.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Maximization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases hull capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to advances in the field of bristling, never before have our ships been so bristling with weapons. They could also bristle with other things we suppose. Your choice.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullStrengthening_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Strengthening

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullStrengthening_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tougher hulls.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullStrengthening_Dec
StringTable.String: Using new force field technologies, we've been able to embed strengthening fields within the structures of our vessels, making them substantially more resistant to damage. They also now tingle if you lick them.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullRepairSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Repair Systems

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The same field technology we use to strength our ships can be used to conduct partial repairs to them as well, straightening and reinforcing battle-damaged structural elements.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSelfHealingHulls_Name
StringTable.String: Self Healing Hulls

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSelfHealingHulls_Dec
StringTable.String: Tiny little self-replicating nanobots are capable of almost anything so long as you don't ask too many questions about them. By installing nanobot repair modules in our ships and starbases, our ships will be able to repair damage during battle itself.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierTech_Name
StringTable.String: Carriers

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier combat will allow us to project force while keeping our capital ships out of danger. Fighters are a lot more replaceable and there's no shortage of volunteers to fly them. Apparently there's something glamorous about dying in a very small ship.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Guardian Drones

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These tuff little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end, and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHighCapacityCarriers_Name
StringTable.String: High Capacity Carriers

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to our latest generation of fighters, designed to be more compact and packable, along with more efficient repair, reloading, and recovery facilities, we've been able to greatly improve the carrying capacity of our carriers.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Logistics

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: It's one thing to build a ship, it's another thing to keep it running. Whether it's keeping it supplied with fuel, ammunition, or people, there is an awful lot going on behind the scenes to keep a deep-space vessel operational. None of this is exciting of course. Logistics officers are some of the most boring people you're ever likely to meet. But a necessary evil.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Logistics

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a little more practice moving assets around in space, and figured out some of the issues relativistic travel creates with our timekeeping and administration, we've been able to significantly improve our logistical capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Mining

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases mining production.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: An asteroid mining operation is an incredibly complicated ballet of activity, as boring machines, ore haulers, and repair drones swarm about an asteroid. Keeping all these pieces moving and operational is a challenging task, and improving the organization of a mining operation is a sure way to improve its output.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Shipyards

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces Shipyard decay rate.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shipyards are, by some measures, the most complicated constructs we have ever created. Any improvements we can make to their management and operations will result in significant cost savings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFleetLogisticsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Fleet Logistics

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
