StringTable.String: The galaxy doesn't just listen to our words. They want to believe them. So sterling is our reputation, that simple gestures by our diplomats can adjust the fate of whole worlds. The pen hasn't just beaten the sword; it's humiliated it.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Name
StringTable.String: United Planets Lobbyist

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks additional Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Dec
StringTable.String: To the initiate in intragalactic diplomacy, there's a shocking amount of crude backroom dealing which goes on behind the surface of an organization like the United Planets. But that's how the sausage is made, and we'll do well if we're better at it than our enemies. And our allies.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericUnitedPlanetsClout_Name
StringTable.String: United Planets Clout

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericUnitedPlanetsClout_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks more powerful Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericUnitedPlanetsClout_Dec
StringTable.String: Our allies have long been convinced of the benefits of our friendship. Now they see the benefit of our wisdom and leadership. We carry a lot more weight in the United Planets now, deservedly so.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalInfluence_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Influence

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: Winning the hearts and minds of both our people and our neighbors will make almost every aspect of running this civilization easier. It lacks some of the visceral appeal of a new type of mass driver, but may in the long run be far more effective.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Passionate Representation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that our culture has made inroads on the planets of our neighbors, we can help cement this influence by encouraging our biggest stars to regularly visit and vacation there, serving as ambassadors for our way of life.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Representation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the artists and dreamers who serve as our cultural ambassadors aren't naturally inclined towards thinking about money, after we locked a few of them in a room with an accountant for a bit, they managed to find a number of ways to do things more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Self Sufficient Representation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The facilities we need for our artistic endeavors cost money to maintain, and many of our artists and directors have very expensive tastes indeed. By encouraging them to reuse materials, props, and punchlines, we can reduce the ongoing costs of running these enterprises.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Outreach

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: By building facilities that focus on spreading our cultural accomplishments amongst our civilians and neighbors, we expect to see even more influence in this region of space, or at the very least, more awards from the artistic community.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Research-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on research planets.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By adapting our cultural products to cast scientists and researchers in a more favorable light, we might find appreciative audiences among the substantial research communities in our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Approval-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on planets with high approval.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A culture which focuses intently on its leaders is a fine thing to have when those leaders are doing a good job. Though when the leaders aren't doing a good job, it's filled with harsh satire and unflattering impressions, so watch out for that.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Wealth-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on wealthy planets.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: If our people have money, let's not make them ashamed of it. By encouraging displays of conspicuous consumption and a culture which celebrates wealth, we can gain a great deal of influence with people living the good life.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericStellarEmigration_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Emigration

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: Our civilization is seen across the galaxy as a haven for all those who desire a more fulfilling intellectual life. If we make the process of emigration easier, we can spread our influence wider still.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalAssimilation_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Assimilation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: We've long since incorporated all the worthy ideas of other cultures into our own, and can now safely say that they serve no purpose other than muddying the waters. By quickly assimilating and removing the cultural trappings of new arrivals, and even those just trying to pass through, we can increase the penetration and acceptance of our culture more still.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalDomination_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Domination

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: There is no other culture in the galaxy but ours, and anyone who claims otherwise is a heretic. Or worse, dumb. All sane beings bow down before our celebrities and thinkers.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalAffinity_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Affinity

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalAffinity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: Other universes deserve the benefit of seeing the light of our wisdom and culture. Indeed, it is a bit offensive that they don't see it already. Our thinkers are now beginning to prepare plans for shining our light on the next world, and beyond.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoCommerce_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Commerce

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic economic buildings. Adds trade route.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which spans the stars is a pretty complicated beast. We don't need to understand it all of course, just supply the facilities and light regulations for the free market to get to work doing what it does best.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Wealthy Population

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases wealth.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: With targeted tax rates, we can encourage a number of different areas of our economy. A tax policy which favor business and investment should ultimately lead to a wealthier economy, for example.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Supportive Population

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases approval.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By targeting economic policy to support workers and the civilian population in general, we can ensure we have a much broader base of approval to build our civilization on.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Designated Trading Partner

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds trade route.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Encouraging and supporting trade is a great way to both bring in extra income and forge closer ties with our neighbors. Everyone's happy when they're making money.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoEconomics_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Economics

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: The recent explosion in newly available commodities combined with the sheer distance between buyers and sellers, has resulted in us having to rewrite a number of different theories of economics.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarBanking_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Banking

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: Capital can now be transferred instantaneously. This has allowed a variety of creative arbitrage opportunities, which will require new regulations and banking theory to contain.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Economy

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases trade route income.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which prioritizes external trading will be well suited to exploit the markets of the greater galactic community, or just exploit the greater galactic community in general.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Well Crafted Treaties

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Diplomatic trade income

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a certain art in the framing of a treaty, and even in an agreement between equals, one party can be more equal than the other. Let's be that more equal party.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Tourism Board

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By reducing the obstacles that foreign tourists might face when trying to visit us, we can encourage more of them to travel here, and more of their money to stay here.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFinancialSectorsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Financial Sectors

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicated financial sectors should help facilitate the flow of capital across our civilization, which will result in more things being built in the places they need to. Wealth creation, in other words, which we can tap for a variety of purposes.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticStockMarket_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Stock Market

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: Stock exchanges have proven remarkably elusive to establish in this galaxy, and only the most recent advances in communications technology and regulatory capability have made them possible.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Trade

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Exchanging goods with our neighbors will theoretically enrich us both, and is worth pursuing for that reason alone. Also, if we play it smart, it can enrich us a lot more than the other guy.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Trade route optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases overall value of trade routes

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By optimizing both the outgoing and receiving ends of our trade routes we have been able to achieve a modest overall profit for everyone involved.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Expanded Trade

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We believe the best way to increase trade income is the establish more trade routes. With a bit of effort we have been able to stretch our recourses enough to establish one more.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Trade

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing fixed trading hubs and encouraging the markets which develop around them, we stand to profit handsomely. The wealth of the entire galactic community will flow through our hands. Our ever so slightly sticky hands.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Tariff Stations

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases now give a significant boost to the trade income of colonies with their Area of Effect.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing a tariff stations on our starbases we have been able to increase our cut of trade route profits.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Route Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: More trade routes, more trade income, who no need for Tariffs, or 'Luxury items', Some times its best to stick to the basics.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticFacilitation_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Facilitation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The sheer volume of goods that pass through a trading port is staggering, and we've needed to develop a number of new pieces of equipment and organizational techniques for managing the flow of goods smoothly. And safely. We've had a few too many large masses make dock workers very, very flat, to not reevaluate our procedures.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeMasters_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Masters

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Our civilization is synonymous with wealth and trading, and all intelligent beings know our markets are the best, really, only place to buy and sell goods. And, of course, certain advantages accrue to the owner of such a monopoly.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoEntertainment_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Entertainment

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoEntertainment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic entertainment buildings. Increases Approval.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericXenoEntertainment_Dec
StringTable.String: With out the approval of our people, we won't be able to accomplish very much. Distracting them with various amusements is perhaps a cynical ploy, but it might be easier than trying to treat them as the rational beings they're so often not.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarTourism_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Tourism

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarTourism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved entertainment buildings. Begin collecting tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only can we amuse and distract our own citizens with amusements, we can begin luring friendly visitors from our galactic neighbors. This will help improve relations, and at minimum, result in some extra income for us.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPopulationDiversion_Name
StringTable.String: Population Diversion

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPopulationDiversion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPopulationDiversion_Dec
StringTable.String: More amusements! Bigger amusements! Our people are at heart dreadfully simple, which is distressing on some level, even if it does make them pretty easy to manage.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Easy to Please

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the morale of your colonies.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that we can make people feel more confident and happy. With proper messaging, we can keep our citizens happy without all that costly infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Easily Distracted

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes building Entertainment Improvements much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that our efforts in keeping our people distracted have paid off. We can now build anything, and they will think it is fun.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Eager to Please

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly reduces the Maintenance required by Entertainment Improvements.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only are our people easier to please, they will now do most of the work it takes to distract themselves, for free.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSuperiorRecreation_Name
StringTable.String: Superior Recreation

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSuperiorRecreation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSuperiorRecreation_Dec
StringTable.String: Zero gravity beaches are a tough concept to wrap your head around, though that hasn't stopped them from becoming insanely popular. Even if they do get in your hair and teeth a lot more than the regular kind.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericContentmentTech_Name
StringTable.String: Contentment

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericContentmentTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericContentmentTech_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that the answer we were looking for this whole time was simply injecting happiness directly into the base of the skull. Our new virtual worlds offer anything a person could desire, at a fraction of the cost of actually giving it to them.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticCruseLines_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Cruse Lines

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticCruseLines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGalacticCruseLines_Dec
StringTable.String: It's actually surprising that for the amount of time our citizens spend in space, very little of it is done for pleasure. Now, to be fair, that's mainly because space is incredibly boring and also still a bit deadly. But if we were to spruce it up a bit, there might be some tourism income in there for us.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWondersoftheGalaxy_Name
StringTable.String: Wonders of the Galaxy

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWondersoftheGalaxy_Dec
StringTable.String: The galactic community is beginning to realize just how awesome we are, and if they aren't, we'll soon be airing targeted advertisements which tell them to. The expected increase in tourism revenue is anticipated to be very nice indeed.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPilgrimageTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pilgrimage

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPilgrimageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPilgrimageTech_Dec
StringTable.String: There's not a single intelligent being in this galaxy that doesn't want to make a visit to our fair civilization, and for many of them, it's a religious requirement. Our home has become the most important destination that intelligent life has ever known.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: It only took a few horrific accidents for us to finally come to grips with the challenges of off-world industry, and now that we have, we've identified a number of ways we can begin improving and specializing our industrial capacity.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Construction Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Seemingly small improvements can have a big effect when applied to large projects, and we're working on some very large projects now indeed.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There's no getting around it: "Incremental improvements in manufacturing techniques" isn't much of a headline. Which is a shame, considering the benefit we expect to see from them.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIndustrialMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: If it can be dreamed up, we can build it. Indeed, many of our economists now believe that the limiting factor of our industrial capacity is our own imaginations.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Research Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Researchers are great at inventing things, but surprisingly bad at the business of inventing things. A number of inefficient practices have developed which we should be able to streamline.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The lab equipment needed to research some of these new fields is incredibly expensive and esoteric. Specializing our research efforts will be necessary to make the biggest advances.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've made great strides with our colonization techniques in the past few years, and can now begin considering specific areas we'd like to improve upon.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing our farming processes will lead to a number of benefits which will help our civilization for a very long time. Until people stop needing food, really.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Farming Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericFarmingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Although all this attention we pay to improving our farming techniques sometimes make our farmers uncomfortable - they do get set in their ways - the improvements to our food production capacity are too great to ignore.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAgriculturalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our farms now provide an almost unlimited bounty, the food doing much of the hard work itself. The first time you see a plant or animal self-harvest is a little grim though, and school field trips have gotten harder.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Environment Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnvironmentOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've reached the stage where we can optimize our program of environmental modifications to suit specific civil programs. Good news for us, and the environment doesn't seem to be complaining much yet either.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Colonization Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Mastering living on an extreme world will make life there a lot more tolerable for the poor fools who volunteered for it.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiospherePerfection_Name
StringTable.String: Biosphere Perfection

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our colonists die without cause. Even the deadliest of planets are now perfectly survivable to us.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a bit of experience sending ships out into the darkness and having most of them come back, we've come up with a number of ways to improve our equipment and navigational techniques.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Ion Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've seen them in wide-scale use, we've identified a number of ways we can make our new Ion Drive systems more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Warp field technology is incredibly complicated, and has in more than a few cases, caused a researcher's brains to melt a little bit. But now that we have some experience working with them, we've identified a number of ways to improve their design.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ships are the envy of the galaxy, and our engineers heralded as heroes wherever they go. Fortunately they don't like going out much.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A concentrated effort to optimize our sensor systems could lead to a number of different improvements.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As is usually the case when equipment is sent to the field, the technicians who actually use it soon came up with a number of different ways to improve its efficiency and effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We don't anticipate any further increases in the viewing range of our sensors, not until we leave this universe for another one. But we can certainly make them a little more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Having captured a few Precursor relics now, and observed the impact they have on our research and culture, we can now try adjusting our Precursor studies to benefit specific areas of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Everyone in the navy is very excited that we're trying to optimize our life support systems, and would certainly cheer if they weren't conserving their air.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our early attempts at building field-based life support systems left behind many messes and many possible opportunities for improvement, which we're starting to identify now.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We have all but mastered direct-nutrient injection technologies, and are wringing out a few additional efficiencies to reduce equipment size and cost.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've watched a few construction projects accidentally collapse on themselves in orbit, we've identified a number of possible improvements in our existing construction techniques.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Gravity Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We took a big step forward with our most recent switch to zero-gravity construction practices, and after a few trial runs and one teensy little accident, our engineers have identified a number of areas for improvement.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Construction Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We're getting better and better at large scale construction with every passing day, and a number of more efficient design practices are beginning to show up on our engineers' drawing tables. Along with the pretty offensive doodles which have always been there.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shipyards are already the envy of the civilized galaxy. But however great they are, they're still capable of more.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Carrier Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: There's nothing like doing something a few times to see how much better it could be. A number of efficiencies in how we conduct our carrier operations have been made clear to us.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Logistical Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of space accountants are becoming trained as we speak, capable of finding efficiencies and boring workers in any industry we choose.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWeaponsSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: By dedicating their efforts on a specific field of weapons technology, our researchers believe they can deliver a number of more efficient weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBeamWeaponOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Weapons researchers have to keep paces with advances in many other fields to get the most out of their inventions. Right now, recent advances in material sciences are opening the door to a new generation of more efficient weapons.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHighEnergyFocus_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of data returned from the field has revealed a number of inefficiencies which we can begin addressing in the next generation of our beam systems. We may also finally be able to get rid of that funny smell they make too.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBeamWeaponMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to push our beam weapons right up to the limits that physics allow. If we want any more power, we may have to move to a different universe.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericMissileOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: After blowing up several thousand target drones and one unfortunate asteroid, our weapons engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can implement for our missile platforms.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarheadFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We've spent comparatively little research time on the warhead components of our missile systems, but now that we've turned our attention to the matter, a number of possible efficiencies should be able to be gained with a little effort.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPayloadMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Payload Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Various physical limits of this particular universe prevent us from wringing more destructive potential out of this generation of warheads. But we can certainly make them cheaper and lighter.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericKineticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Some modest improvements in the energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons could result in improvements to the cost, mass, or even the range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericKineticAccelerationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Acceleration Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Recent advances in superconducting technology should lead to improvements in the critical energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericKineticMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: After several generations of whipping things at other things as fast as possible, our scientists are now really quite good at it. There remain but a few small efficiencies to wring out of the field.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericMilitarySpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Military Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericMilitarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Administration and oversight is certainly the least glamorous aspect of the military, even though the benefits that they provide are so critical.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInvasionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Invasion Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Good news! We've developed some new, possibly amoral, but certainly effective techniques for pacifying enemy ground forces.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGravitationalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitational Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate gravitational fields presents several unique tactical possibilities for our ground forces. This are powerful weapons we're giving to guys with pretty thick skulls, so we should definitely remember to keep an eye on them.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDefensiveFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDefensiveFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our military theoricians have analyzed reports of the latest invasion tactics in use in the galaxy and come up with a number of elegant ways to counter them.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDefensiveSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Tasked with improving the survivability of our naval officers in combat situations, our engineer's first solution: "Don't enter combat situations," was less than helpful. So, after studying the wreckage of a few vessels we've lost in combat, they've come up with a number of possible improvements we can make in our defensive technologies.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericShieldOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've received quite a bit of useful data on real world performance of our shield systems, and have devised several possible improvements we can begin making to them.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBarrierSystemFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier System Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful design review of our initial implementation of the Barrier Field system has revealed a number of possible avenues for further improvements. Who says design reviews are unexciting?

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericShieldMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shielding technology approaches perfection, our engineers now pushing the capabilities of our shield systems right to their theoretical limits.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPointDefenseOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing our point defense systems should lead to a number of different performance gains. Also importantly, less dead naval officers.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCounterMeasureFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measure Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have some field data on ECM suite performance, we've identified a number of different ways we can improve upon the design and construction of those systems.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDroneSystemMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Drone System Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Drone systems dramatically increased the sheer volume of our point defense capabilities, so any small improvement in their design we can make should lead to significant cost or weight savings.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericArmorOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've blown up lots and lots of slabs of armor on the test range, and have come up with a few possible improvements we could make to our armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericArmorFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our armor systems have increased significantly in complexity. An increased effort to model their behavior under impact should help lead to more effective or efficient designs.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericArmorMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of hardening techniques is almost complete, and the galaxy trembles at the girth of our vessels. But even perfection can be improved upon it seems. Some more effort should lead to cheaper or more efficient armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDiplomaticSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: The words we use have a limited ability to affect the way we think, and by studying the vocabulary used by our neighbors, we may unlock valuable insights into their mindsets. And possibly even find out how to manipulate them better.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPoliticalSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Political Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: There are several broad ways to organize a government for a space faring civilization, all of which pose distinct advantages and disadvantages. Rest assured, there's no right choice here; regardless of what you pick, everyone will tell you that you made the wrong choice.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPoliticalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Political Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: As we continue to manage (and often mis-manage) our affairs, it's become clear that a number of political theories we'd never considered viable before might actually be very relevant indeed when practiced on a galactic scale.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPoliticalMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Political Mastery

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Coordinating the activities and direction of an entire galaxy-wide civilization is tremendously difficult. There's just so many damned people. But thanks to advances in deceit and brain injection technology, we can now put this whole show entirely on a war footing, or, if we choose, the exact opposite.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDiplomaticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We profit more from some types of treaties than others, and should begin slanting our diplomatic posture in those directions right away.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAllianceFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Alliance Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Alliances come in a variety of flavors, some of which may be more advantageous to us than others. We should consider our civilization's priorities - and what our new ally is actually good for - before entering such talks.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Although the artists responsible for our cultural delivery vehicles like the extra funding we shovel in their direction, few appreciate the suggestion that they could possibly do things more efficiently. They can though. A lot.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCulturalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Few works of art and cultural artifacts have broad appeal, and it's often necessary to target one's audience to some extent. By fine tuning the tone and content of our cultural products, we might appeal to demographics which are particularly valuable to us.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Commerce Specialization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: With a bit of experience managing and regulating markets on an extraplanetary scale, we're now able to target some specific economic improvements that will benefit us in a variety of ways.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a better understanding of the quirks of galactic scale economies, we can begin trimming back the regulations and policies that seem to be causing inefficiencies in specific industries and areas.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Optimization

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Trading has long been as much an art as a science, by inducing our traders to use just a smidge more science, they might be able to maximize their profits when dealing with certain sectors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have a reputation as fair dealers and market makers, it should be possible to target our trading activities to encourage specific economic sectors.

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Approval Focus

StringTable.Label: Arcea_GenericApprovalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cultural engineers inform us that some well planned manipulations of our cultural materials could make our people happier with what they already have. Which seems too good of an opportunity to pass up.
